text: Niru Thapa (Nepali: निरु थाप) is a Nepali footballer who plays as a Midfielder for Nepal Police Club and represents the Nepal women's national football team. ==Career== At club level, Niru plays for Nepal Police Club of Nepal. ===International career=== Niru Thap represents Nepal at the international level. She is current nepali national team captain. ==International goal== ==References== Category:Living people Category:Nepal women's international footballers Category:Women's association football midfielders Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Nepalese women's footballers
title: Niru Thapa
